camel.kamelet.kafka-source.topic.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-source.topic
camel.kamelet.kafka-source.topic.description: Comma separated list of Kafka topic names

camel.kamelet.kafka-source.brokers.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-source.brokers
camel.kamelet.kafka-source.brokers.description: Comma separated list of Kafka Broker URLs

camel.kamelet.kafka-source.securityProto.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-source.securityProtocol
camel.kamelet.kafka-source.securityProto.description: Protocol used to communicate with brokers. SASL_PLAINTEXT, PLAINTEXT, SASL_SSL and SSL are supported

camel.kamelet.kafka-source.saslMechanism.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-source.saslMechanism
camel.kamelet.kafka-source.saslMechanism.description: The Simple Authentication and Security Layer (SASL) Mechanism used.

camel.kamelet.kafka-source.autoCommitEna.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-source.autoCommitEnable
camel.kamelet.kafka-source.autoCommitEna.description: If true, periodically commit to ZooKeeper the offset of messages already fetched by the consumer

camel.kamelet.kafka-source.allowManualCo.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-source.allowManualCommit
camel.kamelet.kafka-source.allowManualCo.description: Whether to allow doing manual commits

camel.kamelet.kafka-source.pollOnError.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-source.pollOnError
camel.kamelet.kafka-source.pollOnError.description: What to do if kafka threw an exception while polling for new messages. There are 5 enums and the value can be one of DISCARD, ERROR_HANDLER, RECONNECT, RETRY, STOP

camel.kamelet.kafka-source.autoOffsetRes.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-source.autoOffsetReset
camel.kamelet.kafka-source.autoOffsetRes.description: What to do when there is no initial offset. There are 3 enums and the value can be one of latest, earliest, none
